title: New: Julio Bashmore – Au Seve
content:
What happens when you don’t feel comfortable settling down on a record label and signing away all your creativity/dignity to them? Well you start your own label of course.

At least if you’re Julio Bashmore that is, who has just announced the launch of Broadwalk Records, with the first material being this rather lovely new track of his own titled Au Seve. It’s a club banger in waiting, and a surefire hit at this summers festivals if I ever heard one. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
